description:
B.B.B.`s Papa and Grandpa take him for his first visit to a bath house. He loves it, but is saddened to hear the owner say he`ll have to shut down due to a lack of customers. When the three Bottom Biting Bugs see all the people who would be inconvenienced if the bath house shut down, they decide to act... but they only have one week! Can they attract more customers and save the bath house?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 救え!? ぼくらの銭湯
